parameters.name: All
parameters.description: Specifies whether to remove all tags that are attached to the specified resource. This parameter takes effect only if the **TagKey** parameter is empty. Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: This parameter is required when you detach tags from a topic or a group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource from which you want to detach tags. Valid values:

*   **INSTANCE**
*   **TOPIC**
*   **GROUP**

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys of the resource.
